After many theories about TXT's MV, my theory when watching this MV: "At the beginning of the MV it seems like only Beomgyu wakes up, I think everyone is sleeping and dreaming except Beomgyu, Beomgyu wants his other friends to wake up too but in their dreams, his friends want to stay in that place. After I saw the MV, everyone said they wanted to stay in that place or wanted to be trapped in that place. And Beomgyu also knows that the End will come. Finally at the end of the MV, only Beomgyu is alone, he goes back and the others stay there. And the book, maybe the imaginary world is the same as written in the book, Beomgyu stepped on it because he didn't want an imaginary world even though it was fun, he wanted to be in the real world.

Hi bro, I'm your fan and have been supporting you for the past six years. I recently re-watched your Blue Hour MV and noticed that at 4:54 , you accidentally stepped on a book. I know you may not have been aware, but in India, we consider books sacred as they symbolize knowledge and wisdom. We see them as a form of Saraswati Devi (the Goddess of Knowledge). So, if possible, in your future projects, please try to avoid stepping on books. This is a humble request from me. Thank you for your hard work, and I will always support you! â¤â¤â¤â¤ Your MOA

Hindi mein bol raha hun isliye to Mera nahin ho rahi hai ki mat bolo kyunki yah baat Sonam nahin tumhara bhi Janna chahta hai Lekin tumhare sath hua kya kyunki abhi Rockstar kya hai najar se jodta hai yah baat tumhen pata Chali lekin tumne use rokane se pyar kar Liya Jaan ke achcha Laga ham log ne chehra Badal ke hi pyar karne ka koshish kiya tha tere liye lekin tu nahin Mili iski Saja isliye mujhe Diya lekin Saja bhi nahin diya main iske Mul per gai thi milane ke liye per iske bolkar nahin mujhe roka Jo mujhe achcha nahin Laga use chij ke mere man mein malal thi jisko maine socha is tarike se badla lenge vah badla lene ke liye tiktok wali shridevi ki beti ne sath Diya isliye thoda sa main bhi badla Lene mein utaru ho gai Jaise nahin pata main nahin yah Khel khela per use Khel mein thoda bahut hi Maine sath Diya baki sab ne liya thodi si gustakhi ho gai hai use gustakhi se mafi chahti hun main bhi se pyar kar rahi hun jo yah batane se dar raha hai teri beti ki jagah mein hi Bani hun is baat se main bhi hairan Hun ki kya jawab dun per ek baat jarur hai Janki hai aur Hara nahin hogimehandi ke sampark mein hun jo ise guide Karti rahti hun lekin yah Aaj tight karna band kar diya hai kyunki Jo main to Tarika bataen vah ek ek baat sochne ke liye vah pyar tumse Karta hai mujhse nahin main bhi hairan hun jo ham bhi nahin bhi vahi chij dekha Jana per ham vah detail se nahin padh paate Hain Jo Tum padh paati Ho Jo Tum kar paate ho ham nahin kar paate Hain per main bhi tumhari tarah banne ki puri koshish ki ise pane ki per main nahin Paya jismein se main bhi ab so jahir Karti hun ham sorry yah sorry main tumhari Rockstar se bolungi kyunki Rockstar tumhara weekend Kale mein tumhara boyfriend hai yah jaankar main bhi hairan ho gai jismein se main bhi chehra Badal ke a gai main bhi milungi lekin sab ne mana kar diya koi nahin milega agar koi iske aaspaas jaega sabko humne rok Diya hai ab koi nahin aaega kyunki sach ladki ko Janna tha aakhir vah mum hai Kaun agar vah ladki hai Kaun Jo itni deewani hai per tu farishta hi nikali Teri sari chijen nikal kar ham sab logon ne alag alag tarike se check kiya Jo sirf do najar aaye per yah Rockstar hai kyunki vah apne aap kaise mein convert kar liya haiham bhi to jaane hai kaise kyunki ham log chhupa rahe the Big Boss mein Shamil the Jo ek Big Boss tumhare ghar mein hai ek bigg Boss bahar Big Boss Hiran hai ki ham to yahan per vahan Kaun khel raha hai ismein se yah jalaya kahin ja nahin Raha yahi rahega faisla yah plan hai tumhen Big Boss mein Bulaya to nahin hai kyunki phone Sahi nahin Bhari thi baki ham sab pahunch gaye Jo ham log ko achcha nahin lag raha hai tumhari hi chij rakhe idhar bhi ham log vahi kar rahe hain Jo ham log bhi hairan hai ki aise boring si chijen ham kyon Karen lekin bad mein pata chalta hai yah usi ki chijen hai Jo aap achcha lagne Laga hai Rockstar bhi Modi Sahab chunav ke ghar kidhar bhej diye aur ham log ko koi aur hi banakar baitha Diya thoda romantic hua bhaiya ki shaadi thoda sa romantic hua jarur pata chala robot thi uski beti ko usne Diya hi nahin chhupa ke Rakha usi ne claim kiya tha hamari beti ke sath rape Kiya jismein sabse bura laga tha man ke bare mein bola isliye usne Khel khela aur yah baat kisne khela nahin pata Jo pata chala Shivraj Ji ne khela yah bar Shivraj Ji bijali se bole aur big bhi nahin baten aise bole aur aise aise man Ko boli Armaan ne sari baten suni Bharti I mujhe nahin pata bus yahi Khel Khel mein itni badi baten ho gai hai isliye ab clear hai ab tum mujhse Milana chaho Milo nahin Milana chaho mat Milo tumhari marji ek baat jarur Dhyan rakhna vah darvaje se isliye milane ki Jeet main Karti hun kyunki main hi apni darvaje se boyfriend ke sath ghumti rahti thi gadi mein baithkar jab bhi aaj jaldi meri man chillati rahti thi kahan ja rahi hai kya tum aisa karo tumhare ghar Wale bhi yahi chillai kahan jaati hai kya karti hai tumhen main chahti hun meri tarah Bankar taiyar Ho Lekin Tum meri tarah nahin Banti Ho Ghar ki tarah rahti hai jo logon Ko pasand aata main hi jaati thi mere Ghar aaye Jo tumhen mere sath Jo bhi nahin abhi ke ghar gai thi Jo mere sath kiyara adhura chhod diya tha vahi main chahti thi ki tum iske ghar aao Jo yah pura karke adhura chhod de aur tantra ko yah bhi Mera Armaan tha Jo ham sab ne milkar hi industry aur tiktok wale sare ladke banti hai ham logon ne yahi taiyari hai ki jismein se Shamil tumhare Banarasi Babu haiyahi Badal ke ghumte dekhne ke liye hamen to dekhe sapne dekhne jaane ke liye hi Badal Badal ke kitab mein hai vahan bhi Aakar tumhen dhakke hi milte kyunki ham milane nahin dete isase bhi Rockstar se mujhe pyar Ho Gaya hai uske sath sampark mein hun vah mere sath hai aise Maine use bola lekin vah mujhe na kar diya mujhe nahin chahie Jo bar bar Jo bar bar bolata rahata hai sardarni ke shabd leta rahata hai
Aapane tumhari Chandi Rakha mujhe Jaan ke achcha Laga lekin usse shaadi mein aap mile Moti jo hai vah main hun Aisa bolati Ho lekin yah cal mujhe sach pata chal raha hai jairaj kara rahe Ho Mera ilaaj karane ke bad sacche mere hath mere gale mein khujali thi per apne aap ko rakhe hi Mera ilaaj kara rahe hain yad pahli bar dekha Jana cal ki baat aapki mujhe acchi lagi ki ke sath Mera theek nahin tha yah aapko kaise pata chale mujhe nahin pata per yah baat mujhe cal pata chale meri purani baton ka bura mat manana mere bhaiyon ne Jo bil set Karen jiska main sorry bolati hun Aisa nahin karna tha per uski bharpai maine kar di hai is baat kya yah baat mujhe bhi pata hai yah tujhe nahin pata hai per mujhe sab kuchh pata hai ki chup chup ke tum log milte ho yah Rockstar bhi hai saccha chehra badla hai roop badla hai per hai vahi baat hai teri kamar mein nahin tere gale mein khujali hai tere hathon mein khujali hai sach hai Tera ilaaj kyon karaya mujhe nahin pata yah infection usse bhi hai jo uske hathon mein aur galon meinfree body mein infection jaisa hai Abhi infection gadi se hui ya tujhse milane se Hui nahin pata per yah infection ke kamar mein nahin gale aur hath mein hai aur pairon mein nahin hai Jo hi infection tujhe najar aaye to mujhe le jakar se main ilaaj karaya khud andar baith ke main ladki Bankar hi le jakar apne aap ko dikhaya tere ilaaj karaya apna ilaaj karae isliye ham donon theek hain purani baton ka bura main kyon Manu kyunki humne koi galti Kari nahin hai tune lift mangi lift Diya pyar karta hun tujhse to main is baat ki ijaajat bhi tujhse mangta hun pyar karne ka hak de per tu hai ki yah use waqt payegi jab mujhe payegi lekin tune ek baat jarur sach kaha to hi nahin kiski Karun jo ladki mein bhi tu aur ladke mein bhi tu hi hai to main sohini apne aap ko Karun ya apni ya tumhari jismein se humne bhi sharmindagi mahsus ki yah baat galat humne socha baithi ke roke ham tumhari to hi nahin Karen Patrika to hai hamen pata hai movie aur real mein donon hi different hote hain lekin han main nahin bola tha ham bhi Aisa karengeAisa Kiya to hulchul to sach hai ladiss ki hogi Jo Tum donon ki nahin chahti ho tum apni reset kara kar hi se pa sakti ho yah main nahin Kasam khai thi Jo shridevi ki Beti nahin tumhari awaaz nahin bola tha usi ki Armaan vah pura kar Raha hai vahi tumhare yogi Ji bhi sath hai unka bhi Armaan ko pura kar Raha hai vahi Shivraj ji bhi Shamil hai Jo unke hi Armaan pure kar rahe hain vahi tumhari bhabhi man bhi Shamil hai jinki Armaan pure kar rahe hain bhai thodi bahut Shivraj ji ke sath sath Modi ji ke bhi Armaan the Jo ham I felt like Flourian "A Wise Man Fears," but he captured my likeness by the girl who constantly crossed path with the main male character. The reason for her hardships was correct and accurate, strange that. The book and the tree as well... Sebastiaon is concerning, likely has something to do with the other tree. The other tree society in human, they have tiny scars on their bodies in learning how to navigate their honing tree. Interesting society. Wanted to remember them as well, they have amazing reputation and most desirable for service zero troubles keep to themselves, reminds me of myself oddly. my serotonin   i remember going to a school field trip for 3-4 days overnight, with no friends of mine going. Being socially anxious, the trip went terrible for me. This song is what kept me going when I had to relieve my social stress and anxiety. Forgot about everything, just watched the performances and vibed to the song in the longggggg bus rides! Hi, everybody out there. I'm a baby MOA. I think I'm really lucky to be a MOA, as TOMORROW X TOGETHER taught me many things: not to believe in stereotypes, create a new world, follow your dreams, the H in 'together' goes before the T, not before the G. And I also believe that y'all, as MOAs, are lucky too for learning these things. But, sadly, I still see fans all over the world, who aren't real fans. They show love for just one of the members, they point out every single idol's mistake, or either they are obsessed by the idols and act like sasaengs. Well, I want to tell you, that this isn't what a fandom should do.  A true MOA, as well as an ARMY, Blink, Stay, Once, Midzy, MY, NSWER, CLIKE:y, Kep1an, DIVE, ReVeluv, Neverland, WIZ*ONE, and many others, should show true love. Not toxic love. I know it's difficult to show true love if you don't know these people, but the idols do it with us, so please try. Showing true love means being affectionate, cheering up and supporting the idols, appreciating their amazing skills (which everyone of us is used to, but not all of us actually has them), asking them if they're doing well.  With this I'm not saying you should agree with everything they think, but being affectionate to someone who loves you makes you a golden person. Please, don't harm our beloved idols. Don't call them fat or ugly. Don't point out their mistakes, don't sexualize them, don't write malicious or harmful things towards them. They will become sad, they will lose confidence, they will feel so bad. Please, treat them as you'd treat a beautiful and close friend, not a toxic mafia husband. They are humans, they have defects too, but this doesn't mean we have to insult them for that or turn them into such disgusting things. Please remember that THEY'RE ALWAYS HUMANS.

*SOOBIN:* â€œExactly. It used to be that even on the recording I wanted my voice to be as far back as possible, and even on stage I felt too much pressure being in the center and wanted to be off to the side or in the back. I felt comfortable disappearing into the group and not standing out too much, but starting from this album I wanted to show my strengths and my individuality by doing more. Even for dancing I gave the instructor a lot of ideas, like, What if I do it like this, or how about like this? And to the producers: I want to do this part. I want to do that part. And when I felt like I couldnâ€™t get my part, Iâ€™d say, Please, just give me one more chance, and then try really hard. Being a little bit pushy. (laughs)â€

i'm kinda surprised with the amount of people who think or even used to think that Blue Hour is a purely happy-no-sadness song. i'd get it if you only saw or heard some parts but watching the whole thing even just once makes it obvious as to what it's about.  like it's obviously about how they know their happiness and magic is fading away but they still desperately want to keep it, to stay that way, even if it all just becomes their imagination, even if they get trapped in it.   the lyrics are literally "i know we were special", "before that orange-glowing magic in the sky comes to an end", "before you disappear into the night, i take you into my eyes", "here we go, holding onto the last of you", etc. the entire song is just really bittersweet tbh.  also the MV literally ends with the lights on the carousel shutting down and Beomgyu ending up alone. i seriously have no idea how some of you didn't connect the dots.

Jmoas have kept TXT #1 on line music now for over 2 days and is currently at at 53 hours of tracking. It seems to be coming for Force's record which is 144 hours. This is our longest time at #1. Kmoas are still charting TXT on Genie, Bugs, Flo, and Melon. Genie and Bugs are the easiest. We then entered the Reformed Flo Chart which is fabulous. We are the only 4th Gen Boy Group to enter and are still charting. We entered the Melon regular charts and managed to make it again to Melon 24h Chart. This is the reformed chart. Rather than streams it needs unique URLs. We beat Blue Hour's record and made it to 91. TXT is also the only 4th Gen Boy Group to make it on the chart. We also entered Vibe but I don't have those records. Our numbers rise and fall but so far there are over 7 million streams on Melon which is fabulous! On Spotify with only 15 hours of tracking, we made 1.4mil on 0X1 and 5.8mil on on the album over all. We basically tripled the streams of Blue Hour alone and surpassed Crown Era, our highest. The second day of tracking saw us with 5.6mil so a total of over 11mil. Please don't stop streaming on Spotify. We are doing outstanding there. For iTunes number 1s we have 50 for the album so far including a UK #1. In fact we made the top 5 in the 5 biggest markets. We made it to #2 in the US. There is some concerns there as tracking week does not begin until Friday but we have hope of entering the BB200 still. I have lost track of how many #1s we have for the song but I know we made our goal of 25.  So Moas, I'm not sure what is happening here on this platform but don't give up. We need the views here for end of year award shows sadly and despite our loss here we are not giving up!!! FIGHTING!!!

How To Stream On YouTube: ğŸ–¤ğŸ’–     1. Search The MV Manually On YouTube. Example: BLACKPINK How You Like That Official MV  2. Don't Ever Skip Ads (If They Are Too Long Like 15-30 Minutes Then Skip It After 30 Seconds But Don't Skip Small Ads)  3. Watch The MV In 480p Or More.  4. Turn On Subtitles.  5. Volume Should Be Above 50%  6. Don't Pause Or Skip The MV.  7. Comment Everytime You Come To Stream.  8. Like The MV After 30 Seconds.  9. Don't Use Playlist Cause Either Your View Will Be Deleted Or No Matter How Many Times You Have That Song In Your Playlist It Will Be Counted As Only 1 View (Confirmed By YouTube).  10. Don't Report Hate Comments, Haters Also Help For Views.  11. Don't Delete Or Pause Your YouTube History.  12. Watch Other BLACKPINK MVs And Videos In Between Streaming (Boombayah, Whistle, Stay, Playing With Fire, As If It's Your Last, DDU-DU DDU-DU, SOLO, Kill This Love, Ice Cream, Lovesick Girls, On The Ground, Gone).   13. Last But Not Least Don't Engage With Haters, Leave A Nice Comment Enjoy The Song.  Note: Work Hard As Much As You Can, After All We Are Doing This For The Girls!! Remember Longevity Is Our Biggest Goal! DON'T FORGET TO TAKE REST.   Have A Good Day/Night, BLINKs!!

READ PLEASE, THIS IS IMPORTANT !!! INDO VER    CR : ke yg nulis  1) Pre-order berbeda dari first week sales. Tentu saja, pre-order itu penting, tetapi penjualan minggu pertama akan dihitung di acara musik. Misalnya, untuk minisode1, kami mendapat 400 ribu pre-order, tetapi kami hanya mendapat 303 ribu penjualan di minggu pertama. Pastikan jika Anda melakukan pre-order, album tersebut berasal dari toko yang berafiliasi dengan hanteo (kecuali us moa/pr moa) dan dijadwalkan untuk dikirimkan mulai 31 Mei-6 Juni !! Berikut adalah penjualan / pre-order yang termasuk dalam hitungan Hanteo: ktown4u, synnara, gmarket, tower records, yes asia, kpop town, and weverse shop global.   2) Bighit akan melakukan countdown atau biasa kita sebut premiere. MV Premier akan dimulai pada 31 Mei pukul 15:55 pm WIB/17.55 pm KST (5 menit sebelum MV dirilis). Kami menargetkan 1 juta vi3w atau lebih untuk premier ini !!! Mengapa 1 juta vi3w atau lebih itu penting untuk premier MV di Y0utub3 ?? Karena Y0utub3 tidak dapat menghapus liv3 vi3w (penonton siaran langsung). Ini juga akan menjadi langkah besar setelah MV dirilis karena Anda tahu bagaimana Y0utub3 membekukan vi3w dan menghapus vi3w ?? Itu pasti akan banyak terjadi dan untuk mencegah perlambatan vi3w kami, kami perlu memiliki banyak pemirsa di premier ini !!! Silakan bagikan ini di semua media sosial Anda !!!

READ PLEASE, THIS IS IMPORTANT !!! SHARE THIS TO ALL SOCIAL MEDIA !!!   1) Pre-order is different from first week sales.  Of course, pre-orders are important, but first week sales will count on music shows.  For example, for minisode1, we got 400 thousand pre-orders, but we only got 303 thousand sales in the first week.  Make sure if you pre-order, the album comes from hanteo-affiliated stores (except us moa / pr moa) and is scheduled to ship from May 31-June 6!  The following are sales / pre-orders that are included in the Hanteo count: ktown4u, synnara, gmarket, tower records, yes asia, kpop town, and global shop weverse.  2) Bighit will do a countdown or what we usually call premiere.  The Premier MV will kick off on May 31 at 3:55 p.m. WIB / 5:55 p.m. KST (5 minutes before the MV was released).  We are targeting 1 million vi3w or more for this premiere !!!  Why is 1 million vi3w or more important for MV premiere on YOutub3 ??  Because YOutub3 cannot delete the vi3w liv3 (live stream viewer).  It will also be a big step after the MV is released because you know how YOutub3 freezes vi3w and removes vi3w ??  That's bound to happen a lot and to prevent our vi3w from slowing down we need to have a lot of viewers at this premiere !!!  Please share this on all your social media !!!

So make sure to know how to stream properly  Some points to be taken  â„ï¸Get premium if you could, its views weighs more â„ï¸Don't use too many device on 1 IP address, instead you can connect another device to a cellular data, wifi, etc.  â„ï¸Promoting the MV is really really important, we cannot achieve that much if only the same MOAs are the once who keep streaming 24/7  â„ï¸How do you promote? Show it to you fam, friends, go on ig and tiktok and share the links, embed the links to short videos â„ï¸Not to compare but this is why I think girl group MV's have a lot of views, because they have a lot of casual listeners, so make sure to promote TXT, give them exposure. YT also does not delete views from embeded/clicked links. So share the links as much as possible  â„ï¸ DON'T use playlists, DON'T loop, DONT change speed, DONT mute, Watch 2-3 vids in between, Wait for some time to like the vid, Watch in hd or higher than 480p, Put the volume on 80 or higher, Avoid bot behavior, you know the basics â„ï¸ When the new mv drops please please watch the premiere, call all your irl and encourage all MOAs.
